description: Returns a list of RecommendationFeedbackSummary objects that contain customer recommendation feedback for all CodeGuru Reviewer users.

parameters.name: CodeReviewArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CodeReview object.

parameters.name: UserIds
parameters.description: An Amazon Web Services user's account ID or Amazon Resource Name (ARN). Use this ID to query the recommendation feedback for a code review from that user. The UserId is an IAM principal that can be specified as an Amazon Web Services account ID or an Amazon Resource Name (ARN). For more information, see Specifying a Principal in the Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management User Guide. (string) ---

parameters.name: RecommendationIds
parameters.description: Used to query the recommendation feedback for a given recommendation. (string) ---

nested_items.name: RecommendationFeedbackSummaries
nested_items.description: Recommendation feedback summaries corresponding to the code review ARN.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: The recommendation ID that can be used to track the provided recommendations. Later on it can be used to collect the feedback.

nested_items.name: Reactions
nested_items.description: List for storing reactions. Reactions are utf-8 text code for emojis.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user that gave the feedback.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged.
